ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
Identify  a rational number between <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>7</mn>
    <mn>8</mn>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{7}{8}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>20</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>21</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{20}}{{21}}</annotation></semantics></math>.
detailedSolution:
Using the process from the chapter, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>307</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>336</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{307}}{{336}}</annotation></semantics></math> , and there are other answers.
